name: Pulpo Go Go!
description:
This game was my Final Project submission for the Harvard GD50 course.

Asset credits
  • Jellyfish and Octopus sprites by @elthen
  • Background](https://ansimuz.itch.io/underwater-fantasy-pixel-art-environment) by [ansimuz](https://patreon.com/ansimuz)
  • Coral Rock by ChickenTeddy on OpenGameArt
  • Main theme is "Shiny Tech" Kevin Macleod. Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 4.0 License.
  • Coin Sprite used is by @zirtyart
  • Death sound effect by jacksonacademyashmore on freesound.org.
  • The font used is Pixel Emulator Font by Pixel Sagas on FontSpace.
  • Coral, timer and heart textures and other sound effects are self-made.
